{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04351v1", "title": "Global solutions to 3D compressible MHD equations with partial magnetic
  diffusion", "summary": "The global existence of strong solutions to the compressible viscous
magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) equations in $\mathbb{R}^3$ remains a significant
open problem. When there is no magnetic diffusion, even small data global
well-posedness is unknown. This study investigates the Cauchy problem in
$\mathbb{R}^3$ for the compressible viscous MHD equations with horizontal
magnetic diffusion. Using various anisotropic Sobolev inequalities and sharp
estimates, we establish the existence of global solutions under small initial
data within the Sobolev space framework.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-07T11:59:44Z"}
